Class ElevatorSystem

java.lang.Object
at.wielander.elevator.Model.ElevatorSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
IElevator, Remote
public class ElevatorSystem extends Object implements IElevator
Constructor for multiple configurations of the elevator system.

  • Constructor Details

    • ElevatorSystem

      public ElevatorSystem(int numElevator, int lowestFloor, int highestFloor, int capacity, int floorHeight, IElevator elevatorAPI)
      Creates a configuration of elevators for a building
      Parameters:
      numElevator - Number of elevators in the building
      lowestFloor - Lowest floor accessible by the elevator
      highestFloor - Highest floor accessible by the elevator
      capacity - Maximum capacity of the elevator in lbs
      floorHeight - Height of each floor to be given in ft
